text: Radio Disney was an American radio network based in Dallas, Texas, in the United States broadcasting music and other content targeted at children and young teenagers. It is a subsidiary of The Walt Disney Company. They closed in 2021. ==Stations== * KRDC, 1110 AM, Los Angeles ==Sources== Category:Radio stations in the United States Category:The Walt Disney Company Category:Dallas Category:Companies based in Texas Category:Defunct companies of the United States
title: Radio Disney
